metadata.title: CVE-2017-9064 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In WordPress before 4.7.5, a Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF)vulnerability exists in the filesystem credentials dialog because a nonceis not required for updating credentials.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
